summary:
This mod kill heimsker with a dwarven Ballistia.

compatible with almost any mod...

NO REQUIREMENTS


oooohh. and look at talos's face too.. lol
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Just so you guys know how do you actually edit it with a update list? im just rediting by going up and well it might confuse you... so ima just do this to it, i'll just cut the rest out by making a line to block it :D


Me changed the name, and it's really fun this mod... in the ss i showed a chest! it has ballista bolts and you shoot them outa a crossbow. the mod is really fun... played about 45 minutes with it so ya.. Requires dawnguard for the ballista bolts in the chest because its only crossbow use


Don't look under because im not good or dont know how to do a edit log so ya just dont look under the dotted line because they were false updates
...........................................................................................................................................................
This is another edit :D  well for those of you wondering why this doesn't work it's because either one... you installed it manually and installed wrong, just install it normally as you would anyother mod!  NMM and install, then go into data folder and find Kill Heimsker then put that esp in data folder and bam! you welcome... seems i'm getting the hang of it... comment any idea's! i'm down for some[/size]



[size=6]EDIT^-^  [/size][size=1]SORRY FOR BEING NON ACTIVE IN THIS MODDING THINGS, I'VE BEEN BUSY WITH SCHOOL AND I FORGOT ABOUT MY PROSPERITY END FOR FALLOUT NV AND THIS MOD... I WILL BE MORE ACTIVE AND WILL TRY TO MAKE SOME LEGIT WEAPONS AND SUCH, I'VE BEEN PLAYING DARK SOULS 2 A LOT AND I GOT SOME SERIOUS WEAPON MODELS I WANNA CHALLENGE MYSELF WITH CREATING SUCH AS THE "ZWEIHANDER" OR THE "SUNSWORD" AND OF COURSE THE MOST 'BALANCE' WEAPON THE """CHAOS BLADE!!!""""   now thx for taking time and reading.. i will be a lot more active like i said and will try my best to keep up with this modding shit[/size]                  



So i will fix the iron mace trap right after i post this.. their will be future updates with more heimsker
traps...

Please.. don't be so harsh if it doesn't work. this is my first mod ever made and my first time doing something in tes creation kit... well. doing scripts and editing stuff.

the other stuff i did was add my mods i couldn't find in a chest at whiterun.
author: qqpredator3
